exceptions.exn: In environment n : nat f : nat -> nat p, r : nat H : 2 <= r H0 : forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < p H1 : forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j Unable to unify "exists a : nat -> nat, power p 2 = ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) ?M1526) /\\ (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < power p 2)" with "S (∑ n (fun i : nat => power (f i) r)) <= power p r".

original: intros. apply sum_power_binary_lt_inv with (q:=2) (p:=p) (n:=n) (f:=f) (m:=power p 2). - lia. - auto. - auto.
